content: make a wonderfully textured crochet blanket that looks a lot more advanced than it is worked flat you ll combine simple post stitches with our unique bernat lattice yarn to create a waffle fabric that looks and feels professional keep it versatile as designed or customize the pattern with your own colors it s a great way to add a layer of depth and warmth to any space materials bernat® lattice™ 7 8 oz/220 g 389 yds/356 m rose mix 19001 9 balls or 3495 yds/3177 m measurements approx 44 x 48 112 x 122 cm excluding fringe
